text: We stopped in to eat after visiting Carhenge. It was awesome to see they still had a dining area and salad bar. McKenzie took our order and was our server. Very polite young lady. took our order and checked in on us periodically. Salad was good. pizza was hot and delicious. the decor reminded us of pizza hut from the 80's. Loved it.
